title: 820-01700 PP2V5_NAND_SSD Shorted
message:
This narrowed down to the U9400 being shorted, is there a way now for this NAND chips to be replaced? 

It is such a pity to waste an entire board or computer for NAND chips.

title: 820-01700 PP2V5_NAND_SSD Shorted
message:
We have a recent thread where someone changed the NAND; search last two days on the forum.
However, he can't complete DFU after all.
